ltl2rabin

Class SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory

  • Object
    • ltl2rabin.AutomatonFactory<F,A,L>
      • ltl2rabin.RabinAutomatonFactory<Formula,List<MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>>,Set<String>>
        • ltl2rabin.SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory

  • public class SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory
extends RabinAutomatonFactory<Formula,List<MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>>,Set<String>>
    A SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory can create a SubAutomaton from an Formula object, using its alphabet. Once constructed, every generated automaton will be put into a cache, so constructing a SubAutomaton several times from the same formula will be efficient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory(ImmutableSet<Set<String>> alphabet)
      A SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory will be usable for one alphabet.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory

        public SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory(ImmutableSet<Set<String>> alphabet)
        A SubAutomatonFromFormulaFactory will be usable for one alphabet.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - The set of letters that will be used to construct a SubAutomaton automaton.

    • Method Detail

      • createFrom

        public SubAutomaton createFrom(Formula psi)
        This method returns a SubAutomaton generated by the given Formula. The result is cached and returned again, if the method is called again for the same Formula.
        Specified by:
        createFrom in class AutomatonFactory<Formula,List<MojmirAutomaton.State<PropEquivalenceClass,Set<String>>>,Set<String>>
        Parameters:
        psi - An arbitrary LTL formula.
        Returns:
        A SubAutomaton accepting the input formula.
